name: Bigmama
body:
![bigMama rev 0.2](http://dermitza.github.com/bigMama/imgs/bigMama0.2.PNG)

## The bigMama constant current breakout

A simple breakout board for 16 NXP constant current sources PSSI2021SAY ([PDF](http://www.nxp.com/documents/data_sheet/PSSI2021SAY.pdf)). The board dimensions are 25x50mm, ideal for Seeed Studio [panelizing](http://www.seeedstudio.com/depot/fusion-pcb-service-2-layers-p-835.html). The choice of resistors for each source is up to you, as is the color of the power LED (I prefer blue ;).

## Revisions

### rev 0.2

Rev 0.2 is the first published revision.

## Files

* Altium project files 
* Gerber files, including NC Drills
* Schematic (PDF)
